name: The Space Between Us
description:
Tippy needs your help, she is all alone in the vast emptiness of space. 

Features:

  • Only One Button Input
    • Click to shoot enemies and propel Tippy to new friends
  • Dynamic Soundtrack
    • New friends add new layers to the music
    • Collect them all for an unbelievable orchestral score!
  • 7 Collectible Friends!
    • That's more friends than anyone's ever had!
  • Mini - Metroidvania
    • Explore a vast area and unlock new passages and secrets!
  • 3 Challenging Bosses!
  • Incredible Art

Programming && Music: Chris Holtshouser, Steven Walter

Art: Celina Wilt, Chris Holtshouser

Created with Game Maker Studio 2
